MajorClaims.Text: I agree with the idea of studying a lone

Claims.Text: it helps me to concentrate more, and it helps me to build my personality
it helps me to focus more and establish my personality
Studying alone helps us to focus more in our lessons
we are building our personalities when we study alone

Premises.Text: I am a type of person who cannot comprehend my subjects unless I am alone
I can prepare my schedules, guidelines, exercises and go over them all
we have a lot of subjects which require us to sit and study alone such as math, reading, and drawing
I can take advantage of every minute without wasting by studying alone
answering our homework alone encourages us to be more responsible and independent
it motivates us to be accurate in our work in the future
when I fix my study plan with a specific time and finish it on time, it improves my ability in the future to become more precise and careful
